basisSet.dc:title: DZ + Rydberg (Dunning)
basisSet.dc:description: Dunning/Dunning-Hay DZ + Rydberg Basis -------------------------------------- Elements Contraction References H: (4s) -> [2s] T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. C. P. 53, 2823 (1970). B - Ne: (10s,6p,1d) -> [5s,3p,1d] T.H. Dunning, Jr. and P. J. Hay, in Methods Al - Cl: (12s,8p,1d) -> [7s,5p,1d] of Electronic Structure Theory, Vol. 3, H.F. Schaefer III, Ed. Plenum Press (1977).
